<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Data Security Config (AWS Org)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/dlp/api/config/v2/{accountId}"}></MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

Returns the data security configuration for the AWS Organization with the specified account ID.
